mapper.select: select * from member order by regdate desc
select * from member where email=#{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into member (email, pw, name, tel, addr1, addr2, postcode, birth, point) VALUES (#{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{point, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw} where email=#{email}
update member set name=#{name}, tel=#{tel}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2}, postcode=#{postcode} where email=#{email}
update member set point=point+#{point} where email=#{email}
